name: Animal Intern
description:
Animal Intern is about cute humans (you) who intern to become cute animals. When you begin the game you can choose to intern with bears, deer, or tigers!

The game focuses a lot on self-care and positivity towards yourself~ You can make mistakes but you can't lose, and the animals will help you along the way.

The game is available for free but donations are appreciated! Money from this game will help me pay rent and buy stuff for my pets~

Enjoy!
